first_para: Seema Malhotra (born 7 August 1972) is a British Labour and Co-operative Party politician who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Feltham and Heston since a by-election was held following the death of Alan Keen in 2011.

full.extract: Seema Malhotra (born 7 August 1972) is a British Labour and Co-operative Party politician who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Feltham and Heston since a by-election was held following the death of Alan Keen in 2011.
full.title: Seema Malhotra
